code: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ // Tests // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ @Test public void testNoStatefulConstructor() throws Exception {     for (Class<?> clazz : STATELESS_TASKS) {         // check that there is a constructor for Environment only         clazz.getConstructor(Environment.class).         try {             // check that there is NO constructor for Environment and Task State             clazz.getDeclaredConstructor(Environment.class, TaskStateSnapshot.class).             fail("Should fail with an exception").         } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {         // expected         }     } }
